thread.title: Great uptown hotel
thread.title_full: Great uptown hotel - Review of Sheraton Kampala Hotel, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: pmkamanga
title: Great uptown hotel
text: This is a hotel to stay in so cool,I even left some stuff in my first trip and they kept them for me ,if you are 5ft 6inch and below ensure you ask for a room without bath tub,they are soo high you have to try your skipping rope tricks ,the only downside hotel has is they had issues of serving a diet coke to me all the days I was there even when I offered to buy cash or charge to room,it was made to appear the diet coke or coke zero was only for The Queen of England and probably Pres.Museveni ,that spoilt my whole stay, left a bitter taste but the hotel is excellent though aging
